com.quantimodo.tools.sync

Class SyncHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quantimodo.tools.sync.SyncHelper

  • public class SyncHelper
extends Object
    Helper class to control sync Create/updates/deletes pending intents for AlarmManager By default sync invoked once per 12 hours SyncReceiver should be added to AndroidManifest.xml file, in order to use this helper

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long RUN_SYNC_EVERY_TIME

      Removes data related to sync, like last sync time

      Start sync process, ignoring any data that already synced, so sync done from start

      Start sync process
      static boolean isSync(android.content.Context context)
      Checks if sync flag set in Shared prefs

      • scheduleSync

        public static void scheduleSync(android.content.Context ctx,
                long firstStart)
        Set flag of sync, creates repeating pending intent, and invoke sync in firstStart milliseconds
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context
        firstStart - delay in milliseconds before first start

        public static void invokeFullSync(android.content.Context ctx,
                  boolean schedule)
        Start sync process, ignoring any data that already synced, so sync done from start
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context
        schedule - true if sync should be scheduled
